mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id as idUser, a.name as username, a.last_name as lastname, a.email as email, a.password as password, ut.type as userType, p.plan as plan FROM user a LEFT JOIN plan p ON a.plan_id = p.plan_id JOIN user_type ut on a.user_type_id = ut.user_type_id WHERE a.status =1;
SELECT DISTINCT a.user_id as userId FROM user a, user_type b WHERE a.email = #{email} and a.password = #{password} and a.status=1
SELECT DISTINCT a.user_type_id as userTypeId FROM user a, user_type b WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} and b.user_type_id = a.user_type_id and a.status=1

SELECT a.user_id as idUser, a.name as username, a.last_name as lastname, a.email as email, a.password as password, ut.type as userType, p.plan as plan FROM user a LEFT JOIN plan p ON a.plan_id = p.plan_id JOIN user_type ut on a.user_type_id = ut.user_type_id WHERE a.status =1 AND a.user_id = #{userId};
